title: The Pleasure Garden
description: Two chorus girls at the Pleasure Garden theatre have different fortunes with the men they marry.

title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
description: A landlady suspects that her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

title: The Ring
description: A boxer nicknamed 'One-Round' Jack gets into a feud with the Australian champion Bob Corby over the affections of his fiancée.

title: Downhill
description: Roddy Berwick is expelled from school when he takes the blame for a friend's theft and begins a downward spiral.

title: The Farmer's Wife
description: A widowed farmer decides to remarry and draws up a list of all the eligible women in the neighborhood.

title: Easy Virtue
description: A divorcée tries to escape her past by marrying a wealthy young man, but his family's disapproval and her own secrets threaten their happiness.

title: Champagne
description: A spoiled heiress leads a life of luxury on the proceeds of her father's champagne business, until he pretends to lose his fortune to teach her a lesson.

title: The Manxman
description: Two childhood friends, a fisherman and a lawyer, fall in love with the same woman.

title: Blackmail
description: A woman kills a man in self-defense, but is then blackmailed by a witness.

title: Juno and the Paycock
description: During the Irish Civil War, a family earns a large inheritance, but falls into debt and despair before they can collect it.

title: Murder!
description: A juror in a murder trial, convinced of the accused's innocence, sets out to find the real killer.

title: The Skin Game
description: Two families feuding over land discover their rivalry has devastating consequences.

title: Rich and Strange
description: A couple inherits a fortune and takes a world cruise, only to find their relationship tested by new romances and disasters.

title: Number Seventeen
description: A group of criminals search for a necklace in an old house, while a detective tries to stop them.

title: Waltzes from Vienna
description: Young Johann Strauss Jr. is forced to work in a bakery because his father, the famous composer, does not want him to have a career in music.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: A British family on vacation in Switzerland becomes embroiled in an international assassination plot when their daughter is kidnapped.

title: The 39 Steps
description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent. But when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

title: Secret Agent
description: Three British spies are sent to Switzerland to assassinate a German agent.

title: Sabotage
description: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London.

title: Young and Innocent
description: A man unjustly accused of murder goes on the run with the daughter of the local police chief to prove his innocence.

title: The Lady Vanishes
description: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady has disappeared from the train.

title: Jamaica Inn
description: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers that she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Foreign Correspondent
description: An American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London on the eve of World War II.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
description: A couple discovers that their marriage is not legally valid, leading to a series of comedic misunderstandings.

title: Suspicion
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A shy woman marries a charming playboy, but she soon begins to suspect that he plans to murder her.

title: Saboteur
description: A factory worker accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence and stop a ring of spies.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A young woman discovers her visiting uncle may not be the man he seems to be.

title: Lifeboat
description: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat men who sunk it.

title: Spellbound
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

title: Notorious
description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Paradine Case
description: A married barrister falls in love with the woman he is defending against a charge of murder.

title: Rope
description: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: Under Capricorn
description: A young man goes to Australia to make his fortune but gets involved with a former lady and her rough husband.

title: Stage Fright
description: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high-society entertainer.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

title: I Confess
description: A priest hears a murderer's confession, but is himself suspected of the crime and cannot clear his name without violating the confessional seal.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A former tennis pro arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: Rear Window
description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: To Catch a Thief
description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

title: The Trouble with Harry
description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what needs to be done with his body.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: An American family on vacation in Morocco stumbles onto an assassination plot and the conspirators kidnap their son to ensure their silence.

title: The Wrong Man
description: A musician is mistaken for an armed robber and his life unravels as he tries to prove his innocence.

title: Vertigo
description: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: The Birds
description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Marnie
description: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

title: Torn Curtain
description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin and then figure out a plan to escape back to the West.

title: Topaz
description: A French intelligence agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first uncovering the damaging secrets of a French spy ring before traveling to 1962 Cuba.

title: Frenzy
description: A serial killer is murdering women in London with a necktie, which triggers a manhunt by the police.

title: Family Plot
description: A phony psychic and her con artist boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while following a missing heir in California.
